PLAN: Setup my tools

"Hacker Tools"

Check out the MIT lecture on hackertools including Terminal, VMs, Containers here.

Mac

You can follow the mac setup guide to setup:

  • Settings
  • XCode
  • Package Manager
  • Terminal/Zsh
  • Bash Completion
  • Git
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Python
  • NodeJS
  • Docker
  • Terraform
  • Kubernetes

Assets

All Assets can be found under the d10l github organization. Including the cli code, templates as well as coding best pratices typescript and python and toolsetup.

CLI

As described in the DevSecOps section I decided to use AWS as my platform. To increase my developer speed I selected AWS Amplify as my CLI for this pattform and combine it with my own CLI. To install this do:

# installing my own cli
npm install -g dencli

For more info please checkout the CLI README some features are: initializing a git repo, add a git guideline agent and add a aws service.
